Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Refactor FlatOpc to be via extension methods" (#1339) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: This maintains original API surface area, but moves it out of the package itself. This introduces IProgrammaticIdentifierFeature that allows a package to identify what the `mso-application` associated with the package is.

This had been in place for some performance issues in VS. It does make
development challenging, and with the refactoring of the framework from
the strongly typed classes, Visual Studio seems to handle this better.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Bug with Open XML SDK" (#1338) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
We are doing some String manipulation in our code using OPEN XML and Facing issue. 
Text In Input File :  “Figure 4. Word and other agencies like IRCC look this for strategy and technical solutions. “
Text in output File after manipulation: “Figure 4. Word and other agencies l<<client>> IRCC look this for strategy and technical solutions.”
Here IRCC should be replace with <<Client>>, but “ike” is getting replaced instead.

Figure 4 is a link here to some figure. When read in Open XML , it is read as REF _Ref12123123
